aboutMe.theBeginningMsg: My connection with programming dates back to middle school. Since then, I've dabbled in many programming languages, but the one that has become the basis of my adventure is the C++ language.
aboutMe.currentStateMsg: I am a Junior Full-Stack Web Developer. I am involved in developing applications that are critical to business management. In addition, I am currently studying computer science.
aboutMe.futurePlansMsg: My plan for the future is to expand into the development of mobile applications and software that is as simple as possible and will make users' daily lives easier.

projects.realMsg: REAL is a simple 2D game specially designed for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 in one week.
projects.pongMsg: Pong Mobile is a replica of the classic game Pong. The project was made using the Unity engine.
projects.chatAppMsg: ChatApp is a simple online chat replica with basic functionality, implemented in the Laravel framework.

experience.testScenarioApprentice: Executing a test scenario and finding bugs in the application for managing customer requests and producing a corresponding summary.
experience.bugFixesApprentice: Fixing bugs found in the application using Angular and NestJS technologies, which resulted in improved application reception.
experience.newFeaturesJuniorShort: Adding new functionality to the ticket management application using Angular and NestJS technologies, which greatly simplified the process of finding and managing tickets.
experience.bugFixesJuniorShort: Fixing bugs in the store application made with Angular and Yii2 technology. This resulted in better reception of the application.
experience.bugFixesJunior: Fixing bugs in the enterprise management application made in Angular and Yii2 technologies. Changing selected elements of the application to newer solutions which allowed to manage processes in a better way.
experience.touchAppProjectJunior: Design and development of a touchscreen application made with Angular technology, which allowed the company's physical employees to communicate with the main internal application.
experience.productionAdjustmentsJunior: Customization of the production module to meet the client's needs. Changing existing solutions to newer ones and designing new functions from scratch.
experience.documentProjectJunior: Design according to the client's needs and creation of a module for managing the company's documentation, which will enable better circulation of documentation, and in the future will allow to completely abandon the form of paper documentation.
